sentences.sentence: Which of the following is a way of donating?
sentences.translation: 以下哪项是捐款的方式？

sentences.sentence: Donating is when you give your things to help others.
sentences.translation: 捐赠是指你奉献自己的东西去帮助别人。

sentences.sentence: It is so selfless of my teacher to help those in poverty by donating money.
sentences.translation: 我的老师捐钱帮助那些贫穷的人，她太无私了。
